case.targetSaying: O-Okay, I'll do it. Just don't stare at me, please. I'm a maiden after all.
case.state: Don't worry, Catria, I'm... also a maiden, you know?

case.targetSaying: You've seen my boobs and my butt, but being completely naked is a different story...
case.state: W-why would that be, Catria?
Wow! The Chun-li?
This is a weird question, Chun-li, but who does the music at your street fights?
You've still got your boots, at least, so I hope you don't mind another silly question...
Wow, she’s like a born leader!
Florina, you remind me of a really good friend of mine--
Did I hear you right when you said you liked to sing, Florina?
I think it's okay to be a little modest, Florina. And no matter what, I'm here to support you. I promise.
Wow... you're... flexible, Florina!
(Say something to help her, Sakura!)
W-wait, was that the rule? Can we stop now?
I-I feel kind of bad... but you've come this far, Florina!
Eh? Girls playing video games? Is that… common now? I really like Puzzle Games! ...And got made fun of for liking them.
So, you're Sakura Futaba, and I'm Minamoto Sakura. I guess fate put us together here, huh?
Are you... keeping your headphones, by the way?
Are you seriously not even going to give Franchouchou a chance? I'm sure you'd really enjoy...
Futaba, while I want to make everyone know that Franchouchou can be their idol group, you just remind me of one of the girls in our group!
Did... you... are wearing panties, aren't you, Futaba?
I see… it’s like the speculation about who idols are dating…
Uhm. Wait a minute, he’s not a loud guy in sunglasses, is he?
I love your makeup, Hanako-chan!
I meant what I said earlier, Hanako. You'd be surprised how many girls have kind of scary scars. But scars make us who we are, right?
It's okay, Hanako. I understand. I think it's good of you to try and get out there.
I know you're happy with yourself, or you're trying to be...
Y-you can be honest, this is sort of exciting, huh?
So, Haru-san, are you a fan of Franchouchou?
I'm so jealous of your jacket!
What... could you mean... Haru-san? (Oh! Is she... secretly a pervert?)
Y-yeah, Haru, you tell ~player~ what you're-- y-you draw ~player~'s attention...
W-what's next, Mommy Haru? Has ~player~ been naughty? Has she been a naughty idol--
I guess it takes all types to have fans, right?
So, Ini, are you an... actress, then? Or a singer, or...?
H-hey, Ini, you don't think I'm stupid, do you?
You're really good at this! Not the... cards, but the method acting.
Yeah, that seemed like a really stressful routine. I definitely know how you feel.
S-sorry?
You... got started a little bit after... um... I started getting interested in idol stuff, but you've had such a prolific career, Ai-chan!
Ai-chan, you're not really always naked. That's... kind of a weird claim to make! Even in a game... like... um, Strip Poker.
Kizuna, any tips for CGI stuff...?
It's not... shocking that your panties are coming off, but... (Would would Ai Mizuno think of a personality like Kizuna? They're almost exact opposites!)
...I can't believe you took off your underwear first...
Even if you're just digital, Ai-chan, you're really pretty! I'm jealous of how creative your look is!
Y-you will?
(Although...) Say, Mahiru, what kinds of stuff do you photograph?
I'm really jealous, Mahiru, actually! How do you get your makeup and hair to look so pretty?
Of course, Mahiru! I know getting out of a dress can be kind of a struggle...
Don't be shy! It couldn't be worse than... well! I gave you some food for thought, huh?
Awww, Mahiru! I bet you'll get some really... um, steamy photos, at least!
W-well… um… H-how is she going to answer this?
Wait... not Daughters of Dracula. Daughter of Dracula. O-oh.
I hope everyone else is as pumped as me to be playing cards with royalty!
Go for it, Mavis, make your big play!
At least you'll get comfortable!
Hm… I wonder what a relationship with Megumin would even look like?
Are you really from outer space, or is that just part of your character, Meia?
I think the answer to this is no, but... would you like to listen to some of Franchouchou's music?
Oh! I'm meeting with a prince today! How... my pleasure, your grace!
Um... Your Grace, it looks like your... um...
I don't think those are the kinds of things you want to admit in front of a celebrity, Your Grace.
Such a shame. Sooooo awful. You were doing so good,, Crown Prince.
There's a first time for everything, Your Grace! If you embrace even your defeats, you'll keep getting back up again and again!
That's... a total lie, Crown Prince.
To be honest, Your Grace, I doubt you'd be ashamed of much of anything at all...
(A completely normal schoolgirl. Who else would be into idol music?)
A-anyway, I get the sense you're a bit of an honors student, aren't you?
Okay, Monika, you're a poet at heart, right? How do you feel about rap?
Hmm… I know there’s lots of sake varieties named after cherry blossoms…
What's your name, again? Nagisa?
Aww, you're a fan of Franchouchou, aren't you?
So, what do you do for fun, Nagisa? It's all probably good, wholesome stuff, right?
Don't give up! That's the spirit, Nagisa!
Yeah! I’m envious! You have such nice proportions!
It's not so bad, Natsuki! This might be a bit judgmental but, are you into idol music at all?
Wait, seriously? I--I didn't sign up for this!
She did take off two things last turn, so maybe this round...?
Handsome and well-read.
Yeah! We shouldn't force her to do anything she doesn't want to!
I'm not going to pretend like this isn't stresful... but... I'm sure you're going to look distinguished, and beautiful, and...
You're really a goddess, Palutena? How do you feel about... (The Undead) um, idols?
You're even more dressed than Franchouchou gets in some of our costumes!
Sorry, Palutena! But I'm going to have to keep beating you until you lose! I've got an image to maintain!
Is this next thing going to be magic too?
For a goddess of light... you kind of have a dirty side too, don't you?
At least a goddess probably has a divine bra...
Well, you are a goddess. I'm sure you're really pretty... beautiful...? Divine...?
For a girl who dresses like an idol, you're kind of a jerk to everyone, Remilia.
That's great and all, Remilia... (You know, it's bad form for an idol to ignore her fans...)
...For a girl who dresses like an idol, you sure don't act like one, Remilia. The "brat" role's been dead since the 1990's...
How do you put up with her, Sakuya? Seriously! I have some obnoxious fans, but you're so patient!
W-what's she doing now!? What did she do, what did she do, what did she do?
Bye Sakuya! It was nice to meet you! Remember to come to Franchouchou's next concert!
...I've seen you somewhere before.
Oh my God. It's really you!
Oh my Gosh, I can't even... it's so cool to meet such a big influence
S-so, Radical-- I can call you Radical Revy-chan, right?
S-say, Revy, I know you're a little busy...
Um... Ryuko, was it? You remind me of Number Two...
(They're both being such jerks to each other, what do I do!?)
Who's this? Did... is she just late?
You don't have a mic ready, Ryuko? Don't worry, I'll drop mine on you soon.
Uh... I thought the superpowers from costumes were like... a metaphor for female empowerment. Not... are you serious?

case.targetSaying: I know you're just tryin' to fool me, Shrimpy. Or...are you? Why're you here if it's not to defeat me?
case.state: Hey! Short girls don't like to be called "Shrimpy!" I have it on a super good authority!
Your fancy outfit was super neat while it lasted, Ryuko!
Y-yeah. I don’t mind the spotlight, but this is a bad look for me…
Aww, don't be so shy, Saki!
Y-you know, Saki-chan, as an idol, it's my job to watch out for all my fans. You're a fan of Franchouchou, right?
You can channel my Saki, and be brave and brash, Saki!
You're a magical girl... and you fight witches...?
I guess magical girls are sort of like idols, in a way!
I'm sure it'll be as nice as the rest of your outfit.
Don't worry, Sayaka. I had to take off my makeup, so no matter what you look like, it's probably prettier than me!
I like your outfit! It's so cute.
So what kind of music do you like, Sayla?
Aren't you just the cutest!
Sayori, we could be sisters!
I never did find out if you were into Idol stuff at all.
You can do it, Sayori! I'm impressed by your bravery... (And ~player~ is too!)
That's a great outfit, Sheena!
So, Sheena, what is it you do, exactly?
Archaic speech... old-style clothes... huge...
Don't be shy, Sheena! It's going to be okay! (I have a feeling you look even better without it...)
S-sheena, we can see your--
You seem really interesting, Twilight. I love your outfit and makeup!
Twilight, just so you know... it's considered... kind of rude to show off your breasts or genitals to strangers...
Twilight? I know you're a princess, but please try to remain decent!
We got ourselves in a tie, yeah, but we're never gonna die, yeah!
I can't believe this dealer's deal, yeah, but we're gonna see this tie... uh... nevermind.
Nice ~clothing~, ~name~! (It's a shame he's a fan, y'know? ~clothing.ifPlural(They're|It's)~ really kind of cute!)
My heart is pounding, so… if you wanted to be a bit reckless, I wouldn’t mind.
O-oh. I'm surprised you're sticking to small stuff, ~name~! I'd have expected a bit of a bigger play!
Nice to see another idol here, Pit! And it looks like you brought your fanclub!
Oh, so you play the "smart boy" character, right?
An angel, a... me, and a robot... what kind of game do we have going on here...?
(Unless... unless he's like me... and he's a robot with no eyes... he didn't have nipples, but he did have a cock...)
D-does that happen a lot to the two of you? D-do unconventional idols get naked during their near-death experiences?
Franchouchou's not manly, but we embody undying feminine power! You'll never kick us to the curb, Kamina!
Don't give up now, Kamina! I'm singing you a fight song!
Oh, the angel look is really in for costumed boy groups.
Oh, I just figured you and 9S were from a boy group! You're dressed in contrast, after all.
Well, I'm sure you have a lovely singing voice, but you're dressed in loose stuff, with lots of accessories. Most boys don't do that.
Oh! The Franchouchou workout's pretty intense, but... working out for us is kinda complicated...
Your belt's nice, but... it's a very cool shirt, I just wanted to know If you wanted some Franchouchou merch...
It's great to know Franchouchou has such great fans! You're so skilled at cards, so I can only imagine what other stuff you're good at! (Though... if you were good with your hands, that'd be best.)
You're playing super well, huh, ~name~? To have something like that as a backup singer?
(I can't believe I'm doing this. I'm here, in public, without my makeup, and some guy's just taking off his ~clothing~.) S-sorry! I was just caught up on your ~clothing~, ~name~!
Oh, I see. I must have been mistaken. (Hm... so he's one of those lowkey idol boys. Makes sense!)
...Then there's the way you talk about 'Palutena'. If that's not a case of an overbearing manager, I don't know what is.
Well, you'd obviously know that boy groups tend to be bigger than idol teams. Are there a 1S-8S too, or what?
T-this is really an idol thing, and not a something else thing, r-right? E-everyone?
You should go without your blindfold, 9S! It's... maybe less sexy, but your eyes are gorgeous!
9S, your eyes are so gorgeous for a boy... b-but what about the near-death near-nude stuff? I-is that common?
But! We want you to try your best to be happy! So, if that involves fighting, we'll match that spirit!
I may be an idol, but 90% of performing is improvising for your audience. But to look good, you sure have to practice lots.
It would seem that she's not as she appeared!
I see. Well, you certainly dress and act the part. I thought this was just like an idol get-together! With... other stuff.
Palutena, I think you do a way better job managing Pit than my manager does for our group.
...On account of the zombie thing. I'm not really sure we get stronger, but it's worth a shot!
Hope that's not a bad thing to say...
When I'm on stage, I'm so happy! Like my heart is buzzing! I think ~name~ feels the same! She doesn't want to sit down and give up! No way!
Her ~clothing~ is small, but every little piece counts! A win, a song, a grand-slam performance all come from these small things!
O-oh! Looks like some of us are playing really well! Good for you, ~name~! Just keep getting back up and coming on for more!
N-Natsuki, it's really quite rude to assume that just because two girls are close...
(Talk about calling the kettle black, Natsuki...)
My dear friend's named Saki! But you're the brave one for making it out tonight.
Wow! You've come a long way for a meet and greet, Aella!
I see! My idol stuff is usually hand-made too.
Oh! You're doing some sort of... costume change... light show?
(Is this how zombies are made? This is... awful...)
C-could you not, Akko?
(She's smarter than she lets on! Or at least, she's a natural showman, building in the rising and falling arcs...)
A-and nice... sword... are you... here for a cosplay convention?
I admire your commitment to training! Even at a game like this...
It's weird, but whenever you see videos of people like you fighting, there's always music playing!
Yeah! Number Four is actually super shy and conservative like you!
--O-or you reminded me... of her... before... you left...
I guess your boots could come off first, but... I was only asking because I wanted to find out if you were a Franchouchou fan or not! I mean, you did come here tonight.
O-oh! It's not makeup? I'm really jealous! (Good save, I think!)
You just have to embrace them, and keep climbing on up.
Well, even as an idol, I'm pretty into other idol groups. And you remind me a lot of myself.
So... what do you do professionally, Ini?
Right, right, silly me. I won't draw attention to you anymore.
U-uhm. Mahiru, obviously... you won't be taking pictures of us, will you?
I see-- um... I see your point but... I see something else too!
So... you're a real life vampire?
I hope everyone sees whether you're a human, a zombie, or a vampire, you can be a nice person at the end of the day. Or beginning of one, depending on which scares you.
You know, your character? Like... in Franchouchou, Number Six is the sultry one, Number Three is the serious one...
...Consort is putting you under heavy scrutiny.
T-though, I guess we're all... bending one rule or another tonight, huh?
If you're looking for new music, you know, I am in an idol group--
Hey there, Monika! What school do you go to?
I blinked and it was... gone...
Nagisa Furokawa. You can spell your name with one character, right? That's adorable!
Sorry, if this isn't comfortable for you, I can always look away. I'd hate to embarass you.
(Poor girl...)
If you won't accept being called cute, how about "striking?" You really know how to make the most of what you've got, Natsuki!
R-really?
That aside... do gods even watch idols? I bet that'd be super lucky for us if you did!
Oh, come on! But... uh, speaking of magic, it'd be really worth my time if you let me know...
W-wait, where'd your hat go?
S-sorry, maybe I was mistaken.
You're the Radical Revy-chan, aren't you, Revy!?
You're even scarier in person! But as an idol, I actually really enjoyed studying your costumes!
S-sorry, sorry! It won't happen again!
Like... Franchouchou Number Two. I'm Number One... and uh...
It's rather unkind to make your friend take off your clothes...
Um... seriously, I hope you weren't expecting a fist fight...
And even if you're not, it's just the right thing for me to do.
Y-you wouldn't hurt an innocent zombie like me, would you?
Did you say "The Federation?" I haven't heard of them. What kind of music do you make?
O-oh? Would you like some help with that? I always have that problem with my jacket buttons...
(For a girl that's worried about appearances, you sure picked the wrong game for it.)
I see... that's... interesting...
I think ~name~ was making a great statement with her ~clothing~! Even if I had to get down into the skin I... um, well, I was going to say was born in, but reborn... nevermind.
It's great to have fans that are so skilled. Like, wow, she still had her ~clothing~! (I'm really regretting not taking Yugiri up on those card lessons...!)
I'm going to keep my ribbons on no matter what, ~name~! So, I think it's amazing of you to take off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~!
Ryuko, you don't have to be a jerk! And Natsuki, you too! ~Player~, if this is a date, why am I here?
Um... I think there's been a misunderstanding and I am certainly not meant to be here, so if it's okay with everyone, I'll just... no? W-well...
I can't say I'm familiar, but I hope you'll leave a fan of Franchouchou, if nothing else!
It sure is nice having stuff custom-made. Really lets you be comfy, but show off the best parts of your figure, huh?
That was pretty awesome! I wish Franchouchou could just change like that! We could do so many neat things!
Uh... you... you're still there, right, Akko? You can hear me, right?
...I didn't sign up for the tsukommi and boke show, Akko.
I'm jealous! I know you worked hard for those magic spells, but... you still seem to know how to reach people so much more easily than I do.
Well... A-anyway, are you a fan of idol music? You know, lots of upbeat, cheery, inspiry stuff?
(She's impressive in her own right, but how cool would it be if she liked our music?!) Chun-li, have you heard of Franchouchou?
S-sorry if that's really weird...
You can do anything you set your mind to! Junko--Number Four, that is, still gets on stage and has the best voice of any of us. Do you like singing?
It's okay, Florina! Just um... let's hope this game ends soon, for all our sakes, okay?
I-Idol music is great! There's no need to be such a snob, Futaba!
You're just naturally pretty! A lot of work goes into looking like an idol, but you're a natural.
...Some of us more literally than others.
I guess it's wrong to judge a book by her appearance. But you're just the type of girl I'd love to inspire.
Oh my gosh, I get it, this is a role you're playing! Who has a real name like Ini Miney. I admire your dedication to the craft!
Franchouchou doesn't really have a ditz... wait, am I the ditz in my group?
Seriously! I'm an idol, so I'm no stranger to fan photos, but... definitely none of us undressing!
Are you trying to... stage some photos, Mahiru? Just... curious.
You're so upbeat! I almost said something senseless. (I mean, it's not like I eat brains, so it makes sense that she's not like the myths.)
I guess Mavis isn't really a princess, even if she is super pretty.
...Even if some tiny vampires act like giant jerks.
...Given your attitude, I bet you'd really like Number Three the most. She's also a serious, forward type.
You know, Your Grace, just because you're royalty doesn't mean you get to be a royal pain in the butt!
...Do you... even listen to Franchouchou, Your Grace?
Tojiko, that was your name, right? I think you're the more sensible one. What's going on here?
D-deleted? Our clothes surely aren't being destroyed, are they?
(I might be a zombie but this girl is seriously creepy!)
Your friend must be awfully special for you to play a game like this. Don't worry. I'm going to keep you safe! That's an idol's promise!
But, really, you should be proud! It takes a lot of guts to give something like this a try! Carve your own path, as Number Two would say!
Sigh. Yeah, I guess that was dumb of me to assume...
I really meant to ask you about the undead... but... I guess I don't want to get smote.
Well, we're already sort of dead, so if we could perform in the afterlife, what would the harm really be?
...I appreciate your sentiment... um, idols thrive on sentiment, after all. But... how does the whole "resurrecting the dead" thing work? I keep trying to understand it but...
Sakuya, how'd you do that? That was a really cool trick!
(It definitely couldn't be hercould it?)
Just because I'm an idol doesn't mean I don't know about the internet...
Your outfits were a little kinky for Franchouchou... but just perfect for the "scary but sweet" angle we like to use sometimes.
(I just... wanted an autograph. It's hard get those as an idol...)
Okay, so you aren't into idol music, no reason to be hostile...
W-well, I guess if you're special friends... what's the harm in that?
Oh no, Mako! (Idols are supposed to lift people up, not knock them out! Not literally!)
Could you... not call her Shrimpy, Ryuko?
What did I just say about calling her that, Ryuko? Do you think this is a motherfucking game?
(She's so glum! I need to cheer her up!)
I was... kind of like you, I think. I think idol music really brought me out of my shell and my funk, you know? So I recommend it to everyone.
E-either way, cute outfit and please focus on your witch.
I just had guessed you were another idol or musician. Your hair and outfit are so immaculate, after all!
It's kind of a relief to get changed, right? Um, anyway. Franchouchou really touches about every genre. That way we can touch the most hearts, right?
You remind me of someone, but I can't quite put my finger on who...
Hm. (Who is it she reminds me of...?)
Fashion's always been kind of a weak spot for me. I wouldn't have expected ~name~'s stuff to look so cool! Back when I died, you'd have been even more of a trendsetter.
So... I was in the best shape of my life right before you know, so ~name~'s ~clothing~ would actually look real cute on me!
Y-you aren't just picking your ~clothing~ because you're afraid of me, or something, right, ~name~?
Oh really? I bet Natsuki and Akko-chan have some suggestions for things they'd like to dress you in.
O-oh! I just meant the rebellious types usually prefer Number Two. In Franchouchou... my idol group.
Franchouchou tends to like more bright, upbeat stuff, but I think the gothic lolita look would be killer on some of our girls.
(At least the boys here are cute... and they'd probably understand me...)
O-oh! A-as zombies, we're never supposed to unwind our bandages...
T-the bandages again!
Uh huh.
Kamina, are you sure you're not in some kind of band? You're so into the guy-dol aesthetic.
Oh really? I'd bet you'd look good in just about everything.
Saki! Ryuji looks like a perfect fan for you!
Oh... did you hurt yourself, Ryuji...?
Even though I get to be an idol, sometimes I get super jealous. When you're an Idol, there's all these rules you have to follow. An uh, when you're undead, I guess.
If the whole "secret zombie" thing wasn't... y'know, a secret, I'd still love to take a picture with you, ~name~!
The way I look at it, you stop living only when you stop caring! And trust me when I say that I, and all of Franchouchou, care a lot! Even about stuff like ~name~'s ~clothing~!
Sorry for rambling. You're just getting me in a technical mood, 9S!
(And they get along so well... gosh, between Pit's can-do attitude and 9S being... adaptable...)
Sorry, just thinking of all the weird things that can happen...
You are... almost absurdly good looking, Kamina.
Don't just talk about it! Show us that drill, Kamina!
(We're the relatable ones in our idol groups, Pit, you have to be flexible for the fans.)
Aww, there's nothing wrong with loving idol music, Ryuji! But... I can keep a secret if you're embarrassed.
(Poor guy...) Ryuji, do you... I'm supposed to be emotional support, but if you need to lean on me, I wouldn't mind...
Aww, don't worry, ~name~! Let me get you a Franchouchou shirt or jacket to replace your ~clothing~. Promise!
It'll be okay, ~name~! Don't give up...! (I want to be enthusiastic! I really do! I just... just her ~clothing~?!)
I know you can't put your ~clothing~ back on, ~name~, but it'll come back at the end of the game. Amazing how that works, right?
We usually use the small, backless gloves in Franchouchou, but I find the long type super stylish.
Well, no matter what they're for, they look super cool!
(Oh my God. Her butt is incredible. How does anyone look like that?) C-Catria...
In China, do you guys have the same kind of idol bands that we do in Japan? I know Korea has their boy and girl groups, but mostly you hear about Chinese singers as single units...
Maybe if you hum or sang, this'd be easier for you? I'd be happy to join you as backing vocals!
I'm a fan of long gloves like those. They just look so pretty!
Go for it! I'm admittedly a little jealous... a soldier, a singer... you can really--
Would it help you if we sang something, Florina?
You've got a good friend, Florina!
You've got a good friend, Florina!
Florina-- your clothes! You're--
I really like that jacket! It's well-worn, and so... comfy looking!
That's great! I know I needed a while to come to terms with my appearance...
It's hard to find styles for our body type. You know, chesty girls with hips?
Darn. And I just got done praising that jacket!
(I guess if I had her... everything, it would be a good technique to show off everything first...)
It's just kind of hard for flesh and blood-- um... well, fleshy... idols... uhm...
A-are you not wearing makeup? W-wow!
I prefer to be a little more dressed... but it was a great look for you!
It's not armor, but it does help you stay upbeat. That's a promise from Franchouchou #1!
G-G-G-G-Ghost!!!
I was a pretty effective student... but... (I don't think I'd have been bold enough to come to a game like this.)
No...? That's okay! I know this is a weird place to meet, but I bet you'd really enjoy us if you gave us a chance!
S-sorry, Natsuki! I wasn't staring, just... (Think think think, and don't stereotype her, Sakura!)
(She'd be quite charming if she weren't so abrasive...)
No need to rub it in, you know?
Well, maybe not. But they say that humor and horror go really well together. So that puts sex somewhere at that table too? Not like, between them, but maybe at the end of the table?
(But...) H-huh? Seriously, how are you doing that magic trick?
(I shouldn't tell her I can see her underwear... it'd be best not to freak her out.)
We're both just trying to help people live happy lives, right?
Girls with ribbons should really stick together, right, Sayori?
Pink hair, blue eyes, ribbon, schoolgirl charm...
Ah! That's a smart play!
...P-personality...!
Don't worry, ~name~! Seriously! I have the worst luck in the world, but you're still breathing! Don't give up!
I know I'm a little... different looking! But I think that helps ~name~'s beauty stand out-- especially without her ~clothing~!
It's the Legendary ~name~ and her Legendary ~Clothing~! See, ~name~? Everyone's got some sort of legend to them!
But... they really feel a little... matrimonial.
Yeah... I'm starting to feel like I got tricked into coming here too.
R-really? Is it that cold...? I... wouldn't make you, but I'd ask you to be brave, Catria!
Your boobs... b-but, what about b-butt... your butt, Catria! It's-- it's amazing! Sugoi-mazing!
That't interesting! But... I think you can at least kick some butt tonight.
...Plus, life's more fun when you put away your armor, right?
Especially when it's a pretty singer like Florina who's wearing them.
It's really impressive to someone who's really only good for singing and dancing...
Gah! I spoke too soon! Florina, are you okay?
Florina, are you okay!? You scared me!
Does-- does that happen to you all the time, Florina?
That's the spirit, Florina!
(I'm just glad I didn't get to see Florina become Franchouchou #7 with that bee...)
Hm... Most of my idol outfits are more comfortable than they look, so there's something to be said about style!
It's kind of hard to feel pretty when you're undead. So, at least you have a pulse and a heartbeat you can enjoy, right?
Most of the idol outfits Franchouchou gets are for smaller frames. But Number Five has even bigger boobs than me. Even bigger than yours, Haru!

I'm max hyped for this!
Let your flag fly high!

Wow! You're really pulling out all the stops!

You're so cute! Even as flashy as you can be, you really just like the plain underwear, huh? Maybe that gives you more to build on?

You look beautiful! Franchouchou #1 is here to back you up! Promise! No matter what, we're here together!

Don't hit me don't hit me don't hit me don't hit me!

...What's... uh... this is new...

(Say something to help her, Sakura!)
W-wait, was that the rule? Can we stop now?
I-I feel kind of bad... but you've come this far, Florina!
Eh? Girls playing video games? Is that… common now? I really like Puzzle Games! ...And got made fun of for liking them.
So, you're Sakura Futaba, and I'm Minamoto Sakura. I guess fate put us together here, huh?
Are you... keeping your headphones, by the way?
Are you seriously not even going to give Franchouchou a chance? I'm sure you'd really enjoy...
Futaba, while I want to make everyone know that Franchouchou can be their idol group, you just remind me of one of the girls in our group!
Did... you... are wearing panties, aren't you, Futaba?
I see… it’s like the speculation about who idols are dating…
Uhm. Wait a minute, he’s not a loud guy in sunglasses, is he?
I love your makeup, Hanako-chan!
I meant what I said earlier, Hanako. You'd be surprised how many girls have kind of scary scars. But scars make us who we are, right?
It's okay, Hanako. I understand. I think it's good of you to try and get out there.
I know you're happy with yourself, or you're trying to be...
Y-you can be honest, this is sort of exciting, huh?
So, Haru-san, are you a fan of Franchouchou?
I'm so jealous of your jacket!
What... could you mean... Haru-san? (Oh! Is she... secretly a pervert?)
Y-yeah, Haru, you tell ~player~ what you're-- y-you draw ~player~'s attention...
W-what's next, Mommy Haru? Has ~player~ been naughty? Has she been a naughty idol--
I guess it takes all types to have fans, right?
So, Ini, are you an... actress, then? Or a singer, or...?
H-hey, Ini, you don't think I'm stupid, do you?
You're really good at this! Not the... cards, but the method acting.
Yeah, that seemed like a really stressful routine. I definitely know how you feel.
S-sorry?
You... got started a little bit after... um... I started getting interested in idol stuff, but you've had such a prolific career, Ai-chan!
Ai-chan, you're not really always naked. That's... kind of a weird claim to make! Even in a game... like... um, Strip Poker.
Kizuna, any tips for CGI stuff...?
It's not... shocking that your panties are coming off, but... (Would would Ai Mizuno think of a personality like Kizuna? They're almost exact opposites!)
...I can't believe you took off your underwear first...
Even if you're just digital, Ai-chan, you're really pretty! I'm jealous of how creative your look is!
Y-you will?
(Although...) Say, Mahiru, what kinds of stuff do you photograph?
I'm really jealous, Mahiru, actually! How do you get your makeup and hair to look so pretty?
Of course, Mahiru! Getting my coat off without flashing everyone was already such a hassle... not that it matters now!
Don't be shy! It couldn't be worse than... well! I gave you some food for thought, huh?
Awww, Mahiru! I bet you'll get some really... um, steamy photos, at least!
W-well… um… H-how is she going to answer this?
Wait... not Daughters of Dracula. Daughter of Dracula. O-oh.
I hope everyone else is as pumped as me to be playing cards with royalty!
Go for it, Mavis, make your big play!
At least you'll get comfortable!
Hm… I wonder what a relationship with Megumin would even look like?
Are you really from outer space, or is that just part of your character, Meia?
I think the answer to this is no, but... would you like to listen to some of Franchouchou's music?
Oh! I'm meeting with a prince today! How... my pleasure, your grace!
Um... Your Grace, it looks like your... um...
I don't think those are the kinds of things you want to admit in front of a celebrity, Your Grace.
Such a shame. Sooooo awful. You were doing so good,, Crown Prince.
There's a first time for everything, Your Grace! If you embrace even your defeats, you'll keep getting back up again and again!
That's... a total lie, Crown Prince.
To be honest, Your Grace, I doubt you'd be ashamed of much of anything at all...
(A completely normal schoolgirl. Who else would be into idol music?)
A-anyway, I get the sense you're a bit of an honors student, aren't you?
Okay, Monika, you're a poet at heart, right? How do you feel about rap?
Hmm… I know there’s lots of sake varieties named after cherry blossoms…
What's your name, again? Nagisa?
Aww, you're a fan of Franchouchou, aren't you?
So, what do you do for fun, Nagisa? It's all probably good, wholesome stuff, right?
Don't give up! That's the spirit, Nagisa!
Yeah! I’m envious! You have such nice proportions!
It's not so bad, Natsuki! This might be a bit judgmental but, are you into idol music at all?
Wait, seriously? I--I didn't sign up for this!
She did take off two things last turn, so maybe this round...?
Handsome and well-read.
Yeah! We shouldn't force her to do anything she doesn't want to!
I'm not going to pretend like this isn't stresful... but... I'm sure you're going to look distinguished, and beautiful, and...
You're really a goddess, Palutena? How do you feel about... (The Undead) um, idols?
You're even more dressed than Franchouchou gets in some of our costumes!
Sorry, Palutena! But I'm going to have to keep beating you until you lose! I've got an image to maintain!
Is this next thing going to be magic too?
For a goddess of light... you kind of have a dirty side too, don't you?
At least a goddess probably has a divine bra...
Well, you are a goddess. I'm sure you're really pretty... beautiful...? Divine...?
For a girl who dresses like an idol, you're kind of a jerk to everyone, Remilia.
That's great and all, Remilia... (You know, it's bad form for an idol to ignore her fans...)
...For a girl who dresses like an idol, you sure don't act like one, Remilia. The "brat" role's been dead since the 1990's...
How do you put up with her, Sakuya? Seriously! I have some obnoxious fans, but you're so patient!
W-what's she doing now!? What did she do, what did she do, what did she do?
Bye Sakuya! It was nice to meet you! Remember to come to Franchouchou's next concert!
...I've seen you somewhere before.
Oh my God. It's really you!
Oh my Gosh, I can't even... it's so cool to meet such a big influence
S-so, Radical-- I can call you Radical Revy-chan, right?
S-say, Revy, I know you're a little busy...
Um... Ryuko, was it? You remind me of Number Two...
(They're both being such jerks to each other, what do I do!?)
Who's this? Did... is she just late?
You don't have a mic ready, Ryuko? Don't worry, I'll drop mine on you soon.
Uh... I thought the superpowers from costumes were like... a metaphor for female empowerment. Not... are you serious?

case.targetSaying: I know you're just tryin' to fool me, Shrimpy. Or...are you? Why're you here if it's not to defeat me?
case.state: Hey! Short girls don't like to be called "Shrimpy!" I have it on a super good authority!
Your fancy outfit was super neat while it lasted, Ryuko!
Y-yeah. I don’t mind the spotlight, but this is a bad look for me…
Aww, don't be so shy, Saki!
Y-you know, Saki-chan, as an idol, it's my job to watch out for all my fans. You're a fan of Franchouchou, right?
You can channel my Saki, and be brave and brash, Saki!
You're a magical girl... and you fight witches...?
I guess magical girls are sort of like idols, in a way!
I'm sure it'll be as nice as the rest of your outfit.
Don't worry, Sayaka. I had to take off my makeup, so no matter what you look like, it's probably prettier than me!
I like your outfit! It's so cute.
So what kind of music do you like, Sayla?
Aren't you just the cutest!
Sayori, we could be sisters!
I never did find out if you were into Idol stuff at all.
You can do it, Sayori! I'm impressed by your bravery... (And ~player~ is too!)
That's a great outfit, Sheena!
So, Sheena, what is it you do, exactly?
Archaic speech... old-style clothes... huge...
Don't be shy, Sheena! It's going to be okay! (I have a feeling you look even better without it...)
S-sheena, we can see your--
You seem really interesting, Twilight. I love your outfit and makeup!
Twilight, just so you know... it's considered... kind of rude to show off your breasts or genitals to strangers...
Twilight? I know you're a princess, but please try to remain decent!
We got ourselves in a tie, yeah, but we're never gonna die, yeah!
I can't believe this dealer's deal, yeah, but we're gonna see this tie... uh... nevermind.
Nice ~clothing~, ~name~! (It's a shame he's a fan, y'know? ~clothing.ifPlural(They're|It's)~ really kind of cute!)
My heart is pounding, so… if you wanted to be a bit reckless, I wouldn’t mind.
O-oh. I'm surprised you're sticking to small stuff, ~name~! I'd have expected a bit of a bigger play!
Nice to see another idol here, Pit! And it looks like you brought your fanclub!
Oh, so you play the "smart boy" character, right?
An angel, a... me, and a robot... what kind of game do we have going on here...?
(Unless... unless he's like me... and he's a robot with no eyes... he didn't have nipples, but he did have a cock...)
D-does that happen a lot to the two of you? D-do unconventional idols get naked during their near-death experiences?
Franchouchou's not manly, but we embody undying feminine power! You'll never kick us to the curb, Kamina!
Don't give up now, Kamina! I'm singing you a fight song!
Oh, the angel look is really in for costumed boy groups.
Oh, I just figured you and 9S were from a boy group! You're dressed in contrast, after all.
Well, I'm sure you have a lovely singing voice, but you're dressed in loose stuff, with lots of accessories. Most boys don't do that.
Oh! The Franchouchou workout's pretty intense, but... working out for us is kinda complicated...
Your belt's nice, but... it's a very cool shirt, I just wanted to know If you wanted some Franchouchou merch...
It's great to know Franchouchou has such great fans! You're so skilled at cards, so I can only imagine what other stuff you're good at! (Though... if you were good with your hands, that'd be best.)
You're playing super well, huh, ~name~? To have something like that as a backup singer?
(I can't believe I'm doing this. I'm here, in public, without my makeup, and some guy's just taking off his ~clothing~.) S-sorry! I was just caught up on your ~clothing~, ~name~!
Oh, I see. I must have been mistaken. (Hm... so he's one of those lowkey idol boys. Makes sense!)
...Then there's the way you talk about 'Palutena'. If that's not a case of an overbearing manager, I don't know what is.
Well, you'd obviously know that boy groups tend to be bigger than idol teams. Are there a 1S-8S too, or what?
T-this is really an idol thing, and not a something else thing, r-right? E-everyone?
You should go without your blindfold, 9S! It's... maybe less sexy, but your eyes are gorgeous!
9S, your eyes are so gorgeous for a boy... b-but what about the near-death near-nude stuff? I-is that common?
But! We want you to try your best to be happy! So, if that involves fighting, we'll match that spirit!
I may be an idol, but 90% of performing is improvising for your audience. But to look good, you sure have to practice lots.
It would seem that she's not as she appeared!
I see. Well, you certainly dress and act the part. I thought this was just like an idol get-together! With... other stuff.
Palutena, I think you do a way better job managing Pit than my manager does for our group.
...On account of the zombie thing. I'm not really sure we get stronger, but it's worth a shot!
Hope that's not a bad thing to say...
When I'm on stage, I'm so happy! Like my heart is buzzing! I think ~name~ feels the same! She doesn't want to sit down and give up! No way!
Her ~clothing~ is small, but every little piece counts! A win, a song, a grand-slam performance all come from these small things!
O-oh! Looks like some of us are playing really well! Good for you, ~name~! Just keep getting back up and coming on for more!
N-Natsuki, it's really quite rude to assume that just because two girls are close...
(Talk about calling the kettle black, Natsuki...)
My dear friend's named Saki! But you're the brave one for making it out tonight.
Wow! You've come a long way for a meet and greet, Aella!
I see! My idol stuff is usually hand-made too.
Oh! You're doing some sort of... costume change... light show?
(Is this how zombies are made? This is... awful...)
C-could you not, Akko?
(She's smarter than she lets on! Or at least, she's a natural showman, building in the rising and falling arcs...)
A-and nice... sword... are you... here for a cosplay convention?
I admire your commitment to training! Even at a game like this...
It's weird, but whenever you see videos of people like you fighting, there's always music playing!
Yeah! Number Four is actually super shy and conservative like you!
--O-or you reminded me... of her... before... you left...
I guess your boots could come off first, but... I was only asking because I wanted to find out if you were a Franchouchou fan or not! I mean, you did come here tonight.
O-oh! It's not makeup? I'm really jealous! (Good save, I think!)
You just have to embrace them, and keep climbing on up.
Well, even as an idol, I'm pretty into other idol groups. And you remind me a lot of myself.
So... what do you do professionally, Ini?
Right, right, silly me. I won't draw attention to you anymore.
U-uhm. Mahiru, obviously... you won't be taking pictures of us, will you?
I see-- um... I see your point but... I see something else too!
So... you're a real life vampire?
I hope everyone sees whether you're a human, a zombie, or a vampire, you can be a nice person at the end of the day. Or beginning of one, depending on which scares you.
You know, your character? Like... in Franchouchou, Number Six is the sultry one, Number Three is the serious one...
...Consort is putting you under heavy scrutiny.
T-though, I guess we're all... bending one rule or another tonight, huh?
If you're looking for new music, you know, I am in an idol group--
Hey there, Monika! What school do you go to?
I blinked and it was... gone...
Nagisa Furokawa. You can spell your name with one character, right? That's adorable!
Sorry, if this isn't comfortable for you, I can always look away. I'd hate to embarass you.
(Poor girl...)
If you won't accept being called cute, how about "striking?" You really know how to make the most of what you've got, Natsuki!
R-really?
That aside... do gods even watch idols? I bet that'd be super lucky for us if you did!
Oh, come on! But... uh, speaking of magic, it'd be really worth my time if you let me know...
W-wait, where'd your hat go?
S-sorry, maybe I was mistaken.
You're the Radical Revy-chan, aren't you, Revy!?
You're even scarier in person! But as an idol, I actually really enjoyed studying your costumes!
S-sorry, sorry! It won't happen again!
Like... Franchouchou Number Two. I'm Number One... and uh...
It's rather unkind to make your friend take off your clothes...
Um... seriously, I hope you weren't expecting a fist fight...
And even if you're not, it's just the right thing for me to do.
Y-you wouldn't hurt an innocent zombie like me, would you?
Did you say "The Federation?" I haven't heard of them. What kind of music do you make?
O-oh? Would you like some help with that? I always have that problem with my jacket buttons... like you saw...
(For a girl that's worried about appearances, you sure picked the wrong game for it.)
I see... that's... interesting...
I think ~name~ was making a great statement with her ~clothing~! Even if I had to get down into the skin I... um, well, I was going to say was born in, but reborn... nevermind.
It's great to have fans that are so skilled. Like, wow, she still had her ~clothing~! (I'm really regretting not taking Yugiri up on those card lessons...!)
I'm going to keep my ribbons on no matter what, ~name~! So, I think it's amazing of you to take off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~!
Ryuko, you don't have to be a jerk! And Natsuki, you too! ~Player~, if this is a date, why am I here?
Um... I think there's been a misunderstanding and I am certainly not meant to be here, so if it's okay with everyone, I'll just... no? W-well...
I can't say I'm familiar, but I hope you'll leave a fan of Franchouchou, if nothing else!
It sure is nice having stuff custom-made. Really lets you be comfy, but show off the best parts of your figure, huh?
That was pretty awesome! I wish Franchouchou could just change like that! We could do so many neat things!
Uh... you... you're still there, right, Akko? You can hear me, right?
...I didn't sign up for the tsukommi and boke show, Akko.
I'm jealous! I know you worked hard for those magic spells, but... you still seem to know how to reach people so much more easily than I do.
Well... A-anyway, are you a fan of idol music? You know, lots of upbeat, cheery, inspiry stuff?
(She's impressive in her own right, but how cool would it be if she liked our music?!) Chun-li, have you heard of Franchouchou?
S-sorry if that's really weird...
You can do anything you set your mind to! Junko--Number Four, that is, still gets on stage and has the best voice of any of us. Do you like singing?
It's okay, Florina! Just um... let's hope this game ends soon, for all our sakes, okay?
I-Idol music is great! There's no need to be such a snob, Futaba!
You're just naturally pretty! A lot of work goes into looking like an idol, but you're a natural.
...Some of us more literally than others.
I guess it's wrong to judge a book by her appearance. But you're just the type of girl I'd love to inspire.
Oh my gosh, I get it, this is a role you're playing! Who has a real name like Ini Miney. I admire your dedication to the craft!
Franchouchou doesn't really have a ditz... wait, am I the ditz in my group?
Seriously! I'm an idol, so I'm no stranger to fan photos, but... definitely none of us undressing!
Are you trying to... stage some photos, Mahiru? Just... curious.
You're so upbeat! I almost said something senseless. (I mean, it's not like I eat brains, so it makes sense that she's not like the myths.)
I guess Mavis isn't really a princess, even if she is super pretty.
...Even if some tiny vampires act like giant jerks.
...Given your attitude, I bet you'd really like Number Three the most. She's also a serious, forward type.
You know, Your Grace, just because you're royalty doesn't mean you get to be a royal pain in the butt!
...Do you... even listen to Franchouchou, Your Grace?
Tojiko, that was your name, right? I think you're the more sensible one. What's going on here?
D-deleted? Our clothes surely aren't being destroyed, are they?
(I might be a zombie but this girl is seriously creepy!)
Your friend must be awfully special for you to play a game like this. Don't worry. I'm going to keep you safe! That's an idol's promise!
But, really, you should be proud! It takes a lot of guts to give something like this a try! Carve your own path, as Number Two would say!
Sigh. Yeah, I guess that was dumb of me to assume...
I really meant to ask you about the undead... but... I guess I don't want to get smote.
Well, we're already sort of dead, so if we could perform in the afterlife, what would the harm really be?
...I appreciate your sentiment... um, idols thrive on sentiment, after all. But... how does the whole "resurrecting the dead" thing work? I keep trying to understand it but...
Sakuya, how'd you do that? That was a really cool trick!
(It definitely couldn't be hercould it?)
Just because I'm an idol doesn't mean I don't know about the internet...
Your outfits were a little kinky for Franchouchou... but just perfect for the "scary but sweet" angle we like to use sometimes.
(I just... wanted an autograph. It's hard get those as an idol...)
Okay, so you aren't into idol music, no reason to be hostile...
W-well, I guess if you're special friends... what's the harm in that?
Oh no, Mako! (Idols are supposed to lift people up, not knock them out! Not literally!)
Could you... not call her Shrimpy, Ryuko?
What did I just say about calling her that, Ryuko? Do you think this is a motherfucking game?
(She's so glum! I need to cheer her up!)
I was... kind of like you, I think. I think idol music really brought me out of my shell and my funk, you know? So I recommend it to everyone.
E-either way, cute outfit and please focus on your witch.
I just had guessed you were another idol or musician. Your hair and outfit are so immaculate, after all!
It's kind of a relief to get changed, right? Um, anyway. Franchouchou really touches about every genre. That way we can touch the most hearts, right?
You remind me of someone, but I can't quite put my finger on who...
Hm. (Who is it she reminds me of...?)
Fashion's always been kind of a weak spot for me. I wouldn't have expected ~name~'s stuff to look so cool! Back when I died, you'd have been even more of a trendsetter.
So... I was in the best shape of my life right before you know, so ~name~'s ~clothing~ would actually look real cute on me!
Y-you aren't just picking your ~clothing~ because you're afraid of me, or something, right, ~name~?
Oh really? I bet Natsuki and Akko-chan have some suggestions for things they'd like to dress you in.
O-oh! I just meant the rebellious types usually prefer Number Two. In Franchouchou... my idol group.
Franchouchou tends to like more bright, upbeat stuff, but I think the gothic lolita look would be killer on some of our girls.
(At least the boys here are cute... and they'd probably understand me...)
O-oh! A-as zombies, we're never supposed to unwind our bandages...
T-the bandages again!
Uh huh.
Kamina, are you sure you're not in some kind of band? You're so into the guy-dol aesthetic.
Oh really? I'd bet you'd look good in just about everything.
Saki! Ryuji looks like a perfect fan for you!
Oh... did you hurt yourself, Ryuji...?
Even though I get to be an idol, sometimes I get super jealous. When you're an Idol, there's all these rules you have to follow. An uh, when you're undead, I guess.
If the whole "secret zombie" thing wasn't... y'know, a secret, I'd still love to take a picture with you, ~name~!
The way I look at it, you stop living only when you stop caring! And trust me when I say that I, and all of Franchouchou, care a lot! Even about stuff like ~name~'s ~clothing~!
Sorry for rambling. You're just getting me in a technical mood, 9S!
(And they get along so well... gosh, between Pit's can-do attitude and 9S being... adaptable...)
Sorry, just thinking of all the weird things that can happen...
You are... almost absurdly good looking, Kamina.
Don't just talk about it! Show us that drill, Kamina!
(We're the relatable ones in our idol groups, Pit, you have to be flexible for the fans.)
Aww, there's nothing wrong with loving idol music, Ryuji! But... I can keep a secret if you're embarrassed.
(Poor guy...) Ryuji, do you... I'm supposed to be emotional support, but if you need to lean on me, I wouldn't mind...
Aww, don't worry, ~name~! Let me get you a Franchouchou shirt or jacket to replace your ~clothing~. Promise!
It'll be okay, ~name~! Don't give up...! (I want to be enthusiastic! I really do! I just... just her ~clothing~?!)
I know you can't put your ~clothing~ back on, ~name~, but it'll come back at the end of the game. Amazing how that works, right?
We usually use the small, backless gloves in Franchouchou, but I find the long type super stylish.
Well, no matter what they're for, they look super cool!
(Oh my God. Her butt is incredible. How does anyone look like that?) C-Catria...
In China, do you guys have the same kind of idol bands that we do in Japan? I know Korea has their boy and girl groups, but mostly you hear about Chinese singers as single units...
Maybe if you hum or sang, this'd be easier for you? I'd be happy to join you as backing vocals!
I'm a fan of long gloves like those. They just look so pretty!
Go for it! I'm admittedly a little jealous... a soldier, a singer... you can really--
Would it help you if we sang something, Florina?
You've got a good friend, Florina!
You've got a good friend, Florina!
Florina-- your clothes! You're--
I really like that jacket! It's well-worn, and so... comfy looking!
That's great! I know I needed a while to come to terms with my appearance...
It's hard to find styles for our body type. You know, chesty girls with hips?
Darn. And I just got done praising that jacket!
(I guess if I had her... everything, it would be a good technique to show off everything first...)
It's just kind of hard for flesh and blood-- um... well, fleshy... idols... uhm...
A-are you not wearing makeup? W-wow!
I prefer to be a little more dressed... but it was a great look for you!
It's not armor, but it does help you stay upbeat. That's a promise from Franchouchou #1!
G-G-G-G-Ghost!!!
I was a pretty effective student... but... (I don't think I'd have been bold enough to come to a game like this.)
No...? That's okay! I know this is a weird place to meet, but I bet you'd really enjoy us if you gave us a chance!
S-sorry, Natsuki! I wasn't staring, just... (Think think think, and don't stereotype her, Sakura!)
(She'd be quite charming if she weren't so abrasive...)
No need to rub it in, you know?
Well, maybe not. But they say that humor and horror go really well together. So that puts sex somewhere at that table too? Not like, between them, but maybe at the end of the table?
(But...) H-huh? Seriously, how are you doing that magic trick?
(I shouldn't tell her I can see her underwear... it'd be best not to freak her out.)
We're both just trying to help people live happy lives, right?
Girls with ribbons should really stick together, right, Sayori?
Pink hair, blue eyes, ribbon, schoolgirl charm...
Ah! That's a smart play!
...P-personality...!
Don't worry, ~name~! Seriously! I have the worst luck in the world, but you're still breathing! Don't give up!
I know I'm a little... different looking! But I think that helps ~name~'s beauty stand out-- especially without her ~clothing~!
It's the Legendary ~name~ and her Legendary ~Clothing~! See, ~name~? Everyone's got some sort of legend to them!
But... they really feel a little... matrimonial.
Yeah... I'm starting to feel like I got tricked into coming here too.
R-really? Is it that cold...? I... wouldn't make you, but I'd ask you to be brave, Catria!
Your boobs... b-but, what about b-butt... your butt, Catria! It's-- it's amazing! Sugoi-mazing!
That't interesting! But... I think you can at least kick some butt tonight.
...Plus, life's more fun when you put away your armor, right?
Especially when it's a pretty singer like Florina who's wearing them.
It's really impressive to someone who's really only good for singing and dancing...
Gah! I spoke too soon! Florina, are you okay?
Florina, are you okay!? You scared me!
Does-- does that happen to you all the time, Florina?
That's the spirit, Florina!
(I'm just glad I didn't get to see Florina become Franchouchou #7 with that bee...)
Hm... Most of my idol outfits are more comfortable than they look, so there's something to be said about style!
It's kind of hard to feel pretty when you're undead. So, at least you have a pulse and a heartbeat you can enjoy, right?
Most of the idol outfits Franchouchou gets are for smaller frames. But Number Five has even bigger boobs than me. Even bigger than yours, Haru!
Don't damage your clothes, Ai-chan! Outfits are expens-- oh. Right. You're all animation...
...To live up to animation. I guess that's why we need so much extra creativity...
It's okay, Kyoko. I know it's always a little bit of a surprise, but if it's not hurting you, I promise nobody minds that much. Nobody that matters, anyway.
Well, you can kind of see what I look like without all my makeup... it's kind of ghoulish... but... you're so naturally pretty!
Idols don't score points for nudity, generally!
...And are you sure you're not more familiar with idol stuff? Your bodysuit's right out of an old-style retro sci-fi idol group. It looks great!
What kind of game is this!?
Well, I decided to become an idol. I bet you have a ton of awesome accomplishments too, though!
When I was... um, in your... what year are you in? I-I was only a second year high school student when I joined Franchouchou, so... I guess you're right on schedule for realizing your dreams!
You're quite the handsome lady! Very sharp!
You're quite the poet, aren't you? I bet you'd be into something more like rap that pop music, right?
W-well, a goddess should be modest, right? Unless you're a lust goddess, but I'm not feeling particularly lustful, anymore than usual-- not that I usually feel lusty. Just busty, I guess.

Uh, sure sure, Remilia. Um, Sakuya, how'd you do that? That's a super neat trick!
Oh, and by the way, your glasses are super cute, Saki! They really bring out your eyes!

Okay, girls with pink hair and ribbons have got to have lots in common, right, Sayori?
T-that makes this a little weirder than I wanted...
I'd expect nothing less from my "sis," anyway. (That's probably a little too personal, but she does look like me.)
Now I get it! You remind me of Yugiri! But she goes by Franchouchou #5!
I'm max hyped for this!
Let your flag fly high!
Aww, c'mon, ~name~, at least you knew you'd be getting naked tonight!

9S... how do you feel about older, confident women?

I suppose you're wondering about other skills, huh...?
We can't wait to see you, Ryuji!
Show us your stuff, Ryuji! You're gonna kick some butt! For real!
Never gonna stop, so gotta proceed, and keep going! I’m giving it my all, ~name~!
(W-wow! It's nice to have male fans, but he's really something!)
I was like oh no my makeup! And then he was like "oh hey don't worry my ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~ are|~clothing~'s)~)~ coming off!"
Huh! You must be... sort of like me! We have a weird collection of idols tonight, but that won't stop us!
Just... curious about what kind of boys would like idols like me, is all... (Think, Sakura, you could shape him. Train him to use that robot body exactly how you want...)

You're shy? You're shy? Can you be any cuter, Ryuji-san?
With ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ like that, I wouldn't have figured you were into idol stuff. It's pretty cool, just... maybe more practical than I was expecting?
Well, I’d tell you to wish for it, but… I’m not really here to sing Mezame returner, um. Yet, anyway!
Look at me, ~name~! I haven't given up yet, and neither should you! (I may be nervous, but I'm not letting her down! That's a Franchouchou Saga promise!)
No no no! Not like this! Not like this!!!
You're so creative! I think I recognized that one!
Wow! You're really pulling out all the stops!

case.targetSaying: And yes, I'm wearing underwear. I don't know why some people think I don't...
case.state: Why would anyone think that? (To be fair with a butt like hers, I wouldn't bother either...)

Holy crap. You're a total babe.
Haru! It's going to be okay! I'm right here with you!
(I'm always so jealous of girls that can just be so sexual! I have needs and wants too! But... as an idol, it's terribly improper.)

Tell you what, why don't I sign an album or a poster for you, later?
I think it's really impressive how you can keep up your act... (Sakura! Stop ruining it for her! Just enjoy it!)

Smart! You'd... not be surprised how many people try to sneak a peek at our panties at Franchouchou concerts.

...I was so distracted by your breasts I didn't even notice...

S-sayori, couldn't you have counted your ribbon?
Even though your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ gone, we can keep your spirit up together, ~name~! Keep getting back up, and don't lose your head!
You know what they say, the wind is always blowing from somewhere, no matter what! So catch a hold of that wind and let it carry you!
I might be a little... mortally challenged, but I'm still a little fashionable. And I can tell ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ was really special!
I may be a zombie... but... could you not? Seriously?
You know you have a good show when you've made an idol fixate on your costume... and not your underwear.
You're so cute! Even as flashy as you can be, you really just like the plain underwear, huh? Maybe that gives you more to build on?
O-oh. Your sisters are kind of mean, Catria.
I'm jealous... you look so good in stuff you fight in! I wish I looked that good in things I was supposed to look great in.
Cute set, Florina! I'd expected a knight like you to be more practical than something so... cute!
If you're cold, I could always give you a hug... (The best way to make new fans is to comfort them, and she reminds me a lot of Junko...)
That's a relief! I was expecting a horrible spider monster or something. Not that I have... other reasons to believe something like that exists!
Well... think about it. You look fine, but, who doesn't like to get dolled up and feel super max hype about themselves?
If it helps, Hanako, Number Three's body is covered in burns, and she's probably the best looking of anyone in Franchouchou.
Y-y'know, Haru... as an idol, I can't pretend that I'm enjoying this personality... if you know what I mean?
You look beautiful! Franchouchou #1 is here to back you up! Promise! No matter what, we're here together!
(Oh no, it's, like, contagious!)
(Nobody could actually... be this... right?)
Y-you... wow! You even have a bra! (And of course it's adorable...)
...Franchouchou has had some struggles with CGI animation... for music videos and things like that... (Gosh. They really put a lot of work into her details, didn't they?)

I think you might want to stick to photos, Mahiru! You aren't much of an actress...
L-Ladybug, w-what was that!?
--too... thick. Wow. Whatever diet you're on, I'm now very interested.

Can't you two just get along? You're making my job really, really hard... (I'm used to fans debating over which member they like most... this is extreme!

You look so cute, Sayori! It's almost a shame we have to get dressed after this... w-well, not a shame at all, really, but...

Are you really an angel? That makes me feel a lot less weird about the zombie thing. Buuut I'd rather have been an angel than a zombie.
Well... yes, I'm a little curious what you look like, ~name~...
I just want to confirm something...

Take as much time to warm up as you need. I imagine you get pretty hot, after all... if only there was a way to get you off... c-cooled off!

--y-your heart that... Your... your wife's breasts. O-of course... Your Grace.

I guess I was a little surprised-- yours are really cute! If I do get naked later, I'd be... um, happy to compare?

You're so cute... This... has to be a little thrilling, right? (Why do I feel excited to push her out of her comfort zone? I guess idols do want to help people grow...)
And if you want to start something, I'll take you down, and leave you with not one thing. Be nice to Florina, or I'm gonna ream ya!
No fair! They're so cute!

Sheena, w-what happened there?

O-oh! I-- w-wow, ~name~, that's quite the statement. You being shaved and all. I'm... feeling self-conscious now.

Even though you're out of clothes, you're at max cute, and I'm at max hype, Akko!
It's okay to be a little turned on. I think we're all a little turned on. (I'm definitely a little turned on.)

You know, I bet Number Four... Junko... would go about this the same way you do, Futaba. Terribly cute.
For some reason, I suppose I was expecting more maintainance...
H-Haru-san, I think your dirty talk is really working. It's just working on the wrong person...
Aww, don't be ashamed! Red hair's super pretty and it looks great on you! I don't think anyone who you wanted to see you naked'd care much.
(But I suppose she could say the same about me!) A-Ai-chan! Where's your hair!? It's so detailed b-but...
I'll always have a soft spot for a girls with a courage to show their... soft spots! Mahiru's an auteur at heart, it seems!

O-oh! Well... um. Your looks... like mine, but with brown hair, and mine's got pink hair, and... (I've heard of going out on a limb for a fan, but...)

...You know, Natsuki, it's not your part that matters. It's your heart. Don't be so defensive, please?

case.targetSaying: hot springs
case.state: Gah! But onsen is supposed to be private, neutral ground! Who would do that!?
...Sheena, I think your manager was taking advantage of you...
Oh, are you afraid of lightning too, Sheena? Number Three gets that way too...
I-I guess if it makes you happy... I... I just... what? (What do I... do I need to watch over her?)
Sorry Twilight... I guess where you're from, this is normal... I'll... stop badgering you over it. (Even Tae listens! She's so weird! Very cute and nice! But so weird!!)
~Name~... if you wouldn't mind putting away that gun, I think we'd all be more comfortable...
P-please put away your gun, ~name~, it's scary!
(What kind of even is this that people felt okay to bring a gun?)
(Why did ~name~ bring a gun?)
For some reason, you seem very familiar... Chihiro.
Oh! She's back!
O-oh! We're... really seriously doing this, aren't we? (What do I do, what do I do?!?)
I knew it, 9S is in some boy group! B-but I didn't know they'd actually…
Don't hit me don't hit me don't hit me don't hit me!
Everyone be careful! I'm... durable! But the rest of you-- I'd die if something bad happened!
This is a performance, and it's impressive, I'll give you that!
Or are into really cold bodies…
You’re a model, and so striking! Of course you have to have a fanclub!
I'd be terribly embarassed if I forgot a fan's name. Are you new to Franchouchou?
D-don't run away! I'm not that scary, I promise, Chihiro--
Oh! Now I get it.
Oh… so she’s that type.

...this sounds very familiar. Does he do lots of sketchy quasi-legal things to advance his agenda?
I think that’s great, Streaming-chan, but shouldn’t you keep the other players happy too?
S-sorry, I just tend to think about this stuff. Like, if someone asks “Well, how is being an idol different from a regular singer…?”
Um… I have to say, not into being shot. Well. On camera, yeah. But…
If you could find someone as into explosions as she is, wouldn’t they just compete…?
I guess idols can market hard liquor too, so maybe someday…
...And I bet she has a really easy time getting into costumes and the like. Wow, Natsuki, are you into idol stuff at all?
I have an open mind too! How many zombie idols do you know, Streaming-chan!
He admits it!? You're supposed to keep your viewers in suspense about your relationships! That's like idol rule #4!
Aimee, I can appreciate a good show but... this seems horribly violent.
An idol makes sure to uplife her fans and her audience... not kill them.
I know there's such a thing as "knocking them dead" but... could we not, Aimee?
It’s okay, part of a performance is knowing your audience. Sweet and cute does great when you have the personality to back it up, you shouldn’t try to be someone you’re not, I think!
Oh. Yeah… I don’t think my manager or my fans would want to see me naked… o-or would they?
So... you're a new fan then! (I can't shake the feeling he's very familiar, but... I don't know why! Think, Sakura!)
...What's... uh... this is new...
Don't worry, ~name~! One of the girls in Franchouchou has a body that's like yours... I'll still call you Chihiro, and a girl, if that's who you are.
Um… it is kind of nice to be told what to do sometimes.
If you want to be a popular Idol, or amazing scientist, I think you need more dedication. Like… um… Streaming-chan, I guess.
You sure he’s not just your agent? He reminds me of... Not that I want to think about him right now…
It’s hard to be an idol and have a boyfriend… so I’m a little jealous Gwen’s so cavalier about it!
Or… uh, how is it being an idol when you’re also-- never mind.
Streaming-chan, you're getting a front row meet and greet with so many people! Use your charm and keep building your fanbase! Don't just beg!
Sorry, sorry, just thinking about how nice it is to be able to date.
I kind of wonder how alcohol would affect me. Um, as an idol, obviously, I’d never drink before a show.
Hm… I’d be happy to sign some Franchouchou merchandise if you’d want! (Plus, she’s not undead, so…)
