My dear friend's named Saki! But you're the brave one for making it out tonight.
Wow! You've come a long way for a meet and greet, Aella!
I see! My idol stuff is usually hand-made too.
Oh! You're doing some sort of... costume change... light show?
(Is this how zombies are made? This is... awful...)
C-could you not, Akko?
(She's smarter than she lets on! Or at least, she's a natural showman, building in the rising and falling arcs...)
A-and nice... sword... are you... here for a cosplay convention?
I admire your commitment to training! Even at a game like this...
It's weird, but whenever you see videos of people like you fighting, there's always music playing!
Yeah! Number Four is actually super shy and conservative like you!
--O-or you reminded me... of her... before... you left...
I guess your boots could come off first, but... I was only asking because I wanted to find out if you were a Franchouchou fan or not! I mean, you did come here tonight.
O-oh! It's not makeup? I'm really jealous! (Good save, I think!)
You just have to embrace them, and keep climbing on up.
Well, even as an idol, I'm pretty into other idol groups. And you remind me a lot of myself.
So... what do you do professionally, Ini?
Right, right, silly me. I won't draw attention to you anymore.
U-uhm. Mahiru, obviously... you won't be taking pictures of us, will you?
I see-- um... I see your point but... I see something else too!
So... you're a real life vampire?
I hope everyone sees whether you're a human, a zombie, or a vampire, you can be a nice person at the end of the day. Or beginning of one, depending on which scares you.
You know, your character? Like... in Franchouchou, Number Six is the sultry one, Number Three is the serious one...
...Consort is putting you under heavy scrutiny.
T-though, I guess we're all... bending one rule or another tonight, huh?
If you're looking for new music, you know, I am in an idol group--
Hey there, Monika! What school do you go to?
I blinked and it was... gone...
Nagisa Furokawa. You can spell your name with one character, right? That's adorable!
Sorry, if this isn't comfortable for you, I can always look away. I'd hate to embarass you.
(Poor girl...)
If you won't accept being called cute, how about "striking?" You really know how to make the most of what you've got, Natsuki!
R-really?
That aside... do gods even watch idols? I bet that'd be super lucky for us if you did!
Oh, come on! But... uh, speaking of magic, it'd be really worth my time if you let me know...
W-wait, where'd your hat go?
S-sorry, maybe I was mistaken.
You're the Radical Revy-chan, aren't you, Revy!?
You're even scarier in person! But as an idol, I actually really enjoyed studying your costumes!
S-sorry, sorry! It won't happen again!
Like... Franchouchou Number Two. I'm Number One... and uh...
It's rather unkind to make your friend take off your clothes...
Um... seriously, I hope you weren't expecting a fist fight...
And even if you're not, it's just the right thing for me to do.
Y-you wouldn't hurt an innocent zombie like me, would you?
Did you say "The Federation?" I haven't heard of them. What kind of music do you make?
O-oh? Would you like some help with that? I always have that problem with my jacket buttons... like you saw...
(For a girl that's worried about appearances, you sure picked the wrong game for it.)
I see... that's... interesting...
Well... that wasn't your last item... right? So at least you can keep on going!
(It's just nice that people are treating me like I'm normal!)
See it through to the very end, and beyond, if you have to, ~name~!
Ryuko, you don't have to be a jerk! And Natsuki, you too! ~Player~, if this is a date, why am I here?
Um... I think there's been a misunderstanding and I am certainly not meant to be here, so if it's okay with everyone, I'll just... no? W-well...
I can't say I'm familiar, but I hope you'll leave a fan of Franchouchou, if nothing else!
It sure is nice having stuff custom-made. Really lets you be comfy, but show off the best parts of your figure, huh?
That was pretty awesome! I wish Franchouchou could just change like that! We could do so many neat things!
Uh... you... you're still there, right, Akko? You can hear me, right?
...I didn't sign up for the tsukommi and boke show, Akko.
I'm jealous! I know you worked hard for those magic spells, but... you still seem to know how to reach people so much more easily than I do.
Well... A-anyway, are you a fan of idol music? You know, lots of upbeat, cheery, inspiry stuff?
(She's impressive in her own right, but how cool would it be if she liked our music?!) Chun-li, have you heard of Franchouchou?
S-sorry if that's really weird...
You can do anything you set your mind to! Junko--Number Four, that is, still gets on stage and has the best voice of any of us. Do you like singing?
It's okay, Florina! Just um... let's hope this game ends soon, for all our sakes, okay?
I-Idol music is great! There's no need to be such a snob, Futaba!
You're just naturally pretty! A lot of work goes into looking like an idol, but you're a natural.
...Some of us more literally than others.
I guess it's wrong to judge a book by her appearance. But you're just the type of girl I'd love to inspire.
Oh my gosh, I get it, this is a role you're playing! Who has a real name like Ini Miney. I admire your dedication to the craft!
Franchouchou doesn't really have a ditz... wait, am I the ditz in my group?
Seriously! I'm an idol, so I'm no stranger to fan photos, but... definitely none of us undressing!
Are you trying to... stage some photos, Mahiru? Just... curious.
You're so upbeat! I almost said something senseless. (I mean, it's not like I eat brains, so it makes sense that she's not like the myths.)
I guess Mavis isn't really a princess, even if she is super pretty.
...Even if some tiny vampires act like giant jerks.
...Given your attitude, I bet you'd really like Number Three the most. She's also a serious, forward type.
You know, Your Grace, just because you're royalty doesn't mean you get to be a royal pain in the butt!
...Do you... even listen to Franchouchou, Your Grace?
Tojiko, that was your name, right? I think you're the more sensible one. What's going on here?
D-deleted? Our clothes surely aren't being destroyed, are they?
(I might be a zombie but this girl is seriously creepy!)
Your friend must be awfully special for you to play a game like this. Don't worry. I'm going to keep you safe! That's an idol's promise!
But, really, you should be proud! It takes a lot of guts to give something like this a try! Carve your own path, as Number Two would say!
Sigh. Yeah, I guess that was dumb of me to assume...
I really meant to ask you about the undead... but... I guess I don't want to get smote.
Well, we're already sort of dead, so if we could perform in the afterlife, what would the harm really be?
...I appreciate your sentiment... um, idols thrive on sentiment, after all. But... how does the whole "resurrecting the dead" thing work? I keep trying to understand it but...
Sakuya, how'd you do that? That was a really cool trick!
(It definitely couldn't be hercould it?)
Just because I'm an idol doesn't mean I don't know about the internet...
Your outfits were a little kinky for Franchouchou... but just perfect for the "scary but sweet" angle we like to use sometimes.
(I just... wanted an autograph. It's hard get those as an idol...)
Okay, so you aren't into idol music, no reason to be hostile...
W-well, I guess if you're special friends... what's the harm in that?
Oh no, Mako! (Idols are supposed to lift people up, not knock them out! Not literally!)
Could you... not call her Shrimpy, Ryuko?
What did I just say about calling her that, Ryuko? Do you think this is a motherfucking game?
(She's so glum! I need to cheer her up!)
I was... kind of like you, I think. I think idol music really brought me out of my shell and my funk, you know? So I recommend it to everyone.
E-either way, cute outfit and please focus on your witch.
I just had guessed you were another idol or musician. Your hair and outfit are so immaculate, after all!
It's kind of a relief to get changed, right? Um, anyway. Franchouchou really touches about every genre. That way we can touch the most hearts, right?
You remind me of someone, but I can't quite put my finger on who...
Hm. (Who is it she reminds me of...?)
Uhhhhhh... huh...? That's it?
You did just get a private show, ~name~. Maybe next time you should take off something better?
I bet you're just building towards the finale, right? ...Right?
Oh really? I bet Natsuki and Akko-chan have some suggestions for things they'd like to dress you in.
O-oh! I just meant the rebellious types usually prefer Number Two. In Franchouchou... my idol group.
Franchouchou tends to like more bright, upbeat stuff, but I think the gothic lolita look would be killer on some of our girls.
(At least the boys here are cute... and they'd probably understand me...)
O-oh! A-as zombies, we're never supposed to unwind our bandages...
T-the bandages again!
Uh huh.
Kamina, are you sure you're not in some kind of band? You're so into the guy-dol aesthetic.
Oh really? I'd bet you'd look good in just about everything.
Saki! Ryuji looks like a perfect fan for you!
Oh... did you hurt yourself, Ryuji...?
Not every perfomance can be perfect, but... I guess I could've done better, if this is all of your inspiration, ~name~.
I won't give up on Saga, and I won't give up on you, ~name~. Keep playing, okay?
If you're a little shy, that's fine, ~name~! I'm still here to support you!
Sorry for rambling. You're just getting me in a technical mood, 9S!
(And they get along so well... gosh, between Pit's can-do attitude and 9S being... adaptable...)
Sorry, just thinking of all the weird things that can happen...
You are... almost absurdly good looking, Kamina.
Don't just talk about it! Show us that drill, Kamina!
(We're the relatable ones in our idol groups, Pit, you have to be flexible for the fans.)
Aww, there's nothing wrong with loving idol music, Ryuji! But... I can keep a secret if you're embarrassed.
(Poor guy...) Ryuji, do you... I'm supposed to be emotional support, but if you need to lean on me, I wouldn't mind...
W-wait a second, didn't you take that off earlier?
You only live once, you know?
It's not weird if I hum a little bit, considering I just... you know.
We usually use the small, backless gloves in Franchouchou, but I find the long type super stylish.
Well, no matter what they're for, they look super cool!
(Oh my God. Her butt is incredible. How does anyone look like that?) C-Catria...
In China, do you guys have the same kind of idol bands that we do in Japan? I know Korea has their boy and girl groups, but mostly you hear about Chinese singers as single units...
Maybe if you hum or sang, this'd be easier for you? I'd be happy to join you as backing vocals!
I'm a fan of long gloves like those. They just look so pretty!
Go for it! I'm admittedly a little jealous... a soldier, a singer... you can really--
Would it help you if we sang something, Florina?
You've got a good friend, Florina!
You've got a good friend, Florina!
Florina-- your clothes! You're--
I really like that jacket! It's well-worn, and so... comfy looking!
That's great! I know I needed a while to come to terms with my appearance...
It's hard to find styles for our body type. You know, chesty girls with hips?
Darn. And I just got done praising that jacket!
(I guess if I had her... everything, it would be a good technique to show off everything first...)
It's just kind of hard for flesh and blood-- um... well, fleshy... idols... uhm...
A-are you not wearing makeup? W-wow!
I prefer to be a little more dressed... but it was a great look for you!
It's not armor, but it does help you stay upbeat. That's a promise from Franchouchou #1!
G-G-G-G-Ghost!!!
I was a pretty effective student... but... (I don't think I'd have been bold enough to come to a game like this.)
No...? That's okay! I know this is a weird place to meet, but I bet you'd really enjoy us if you gave us a chance!
S-sorry, Natsuki! I wasn't staring, just... (Think think think, and don't stereotype her, Sakura!)
(She'd be quite charming if she weren't so abrasive...)
No need to rub it in, you know?
Well, maybe not. But they say that humor and horror go really well together. So that puts sex somewhere at that table too? Not like, between them, but maybe at the end of the table?
(But...) H-huh? Seriously, how are you doing that magic trick?
(I shouldn't tell her I can see her underwear... it'd be best not to freak her out.)
We're both just trying to help people live happy lives, right?
Girls with ribbons should really stick together, right, Sayori?
Pink hair, blue eyes, ribbon, schoolgirl charm...
Ah! That's a smart play!
...P-personality...!
You're-- you're amazing! You still had your ~clothing~! I hardly even noticed! I couldn't keep my eyes off you!
You're still kind of being defensive, ~name~. Just let go and enjoy things! Life's a lot happier when you do that.
I think I'll stick to singing and dancing. I've got the worst luck for games like this.
But... they really feel a little... matrimonial.
Yeah... I'm starting to feel like I got tricked into coming here too.
R-really? Is it that cold...? I... wouldn't make you, but I'd ask you to be brave, Catria!
Your boobs... b-but, what about b-butt... your butt, Catria! It's-- it's amazing! Sugoi-mazing!
That't interesting! But... I think you can at least kick some butt tonight.
...Plus, life's more fun when you put away your armor, right?
Especially when it's a pretty singer like Florina who's wearing them.
It's really impressive to someone who's really only good for singing and dancing...
Gah! I spoke too soon! Florina, are you okay?
Florina, are you okay!? You scared me!
Does-- does that happen to you all the time, Florina?
That's the spirit, Florina!
(I'm just glad I didn't get to see Florina become Franchouchou #7 with that bee...)
Hm... Most of my idol outfits are more comfortable than they look, so there's something to be said about style!
It's kind of hard to feel pretty when you're undead. So, at least you have a pulse and a heartbeat you can enjoy, right?
Most of the idol outfits Franchouchou gets are for smaller frames. But Number Five has even bigger boobs than me. Even bigger than yours, Haru!
Don't damage your clothes, Ai-chan! Outfits are expens-- oh. Right. You're all animation...
...To live up to animation. I guess that's why we need so much extra creativity...
It's okay, Kyoko. I know it's always a little bit of a surprise, but if it's not hurting you, I promise nobody minds that much. Nobody that matters, anyway.
Well, you can kind of see what I look like without all my makeup... it's kind of ghoulish... but... you're so naturally pretty!
Idols don't score points for nudity, generally!
...And are you sure you're not more familiar with idol stuff? Your bodysuit's right out of an old-style retro sci-fi idol group. It looks great!
What kind of game is this!?
Well, I decided to become an idol. I bet you have a ton of awesome accomplishments too, though!
When I was... um, in your... what year are you in? I-I was only a second year high school student when I joined Franchouchou, so... I guess you're right on schedule for realizing your dreams!
You're quite the handsome lady! Very sharp!
You're quite the poet, aren't you? I bet you'd be into something more like rap that pop music, right?
W-well, a goddess should be modest, right? Unless you're a lust goddess, but I'm not feeling particularly lustful, anymore than usual-- not that I usually feel lusty. Just busty, I guess.
Well, Palutena, you're down the wire! But I've definitely learned to believe in you over the course of the game!
Uh, sure sure, Remilia. Um, Sakuya, how'd you do that? That's a super neat trick!
Oh, and by the way, your glasses are super cute, Saki! They really bring out your eyes!
Don't be shy, Sayaka! We're here to help people, remember...? Though getting to wear cute outfits is a big plus in my book.
Okay, girls with pink hair and ribbons have got to have lots in common, right, Sayori?
T-that makes this a little weirder than I wanted...
I'd expect nothing less from my "sis," anyway. (That's probably a little too personal, but she does look like me.)
Now I get it! You remind me of Yugiri! But she goes by Franchouchou #5!
If you want an encore, ~name~, you're gonna need to cheer louder!
K-kinda a shame we can't put stuff on 'til everyone's done.
Encore, encore, encore!
J-just hypothetically. In a technical way.
9S... how do you feel about older, confident women?
Well, I bet he's pretty big where it counts, Pit!
I suppose you're wondering about other skills, huh...?
We can't wait to see you, Ryuji!
Show us your stuff, Ryuji! You're gonna kick some butt! For real!
There we go, ~name~! That's what I like to see!
You got this idol's pulse moving, ~name~...
S-say, after this, could I borrow your ~clothing~? I just... n-nevermind.
Huh! You must be... sort of like me! We have a weird collection of idols tonight, but that won't stop us!
Just... curious about what kind of boys would like idols like me, is all... (Think, Sakura, you could shape him. Train him to use that robot body exactly how you want...)
N-not that size is as important as endurance, I mean, imagine if you had a girl with big boobs, but she couldn't stay on top for very long, that'd be unfortuante, r-right? Um...
N-never mind. Idols could never admit to... g-go on, Kamina! Glad to see you're inspired, anyway!
Well, if you're inviting the look, I guess you're doing an idol-level performance, huh?
You're shy? You're shy? Can you be any cuter, Ryuji-san?
I wasn't planning on this when I came in today, but this is definitely a new kind of inspring!
Hm... (I wonder what she's wearing under that? Stuff's changed a bunch since the late 00's, so maybe...?)
Step out your ~clothing~ and step up to the challenge! You're still in this, ~name~, so don't back down!
No no no! Not like this! Not like this!!!
You're so creative! I think I recognized that one!
Wow! You're really pulling out all the stops!

case.targetSaying: And yes, I'm wearing underwear. I don't know why some people think I don't...
case.state: Why would anyone think that? (To be fair with a butt like hers, I wouldn't bother either...)

case.targetSaying: What a shame... Palla once said my tunic's the main reason I get chosen as a party member. I wonder what she meant...
case.state: I'm sure that's not true. You're really good with swords, and spears, and not slaying friendly idols, so I'm sure there's lots of other virtues besides your clothes.
It's a beautiful dress, Chun-li!
You are wearing underwear, right? What is with people and assuming just because you wear a dress, you've got nothing under it?
A-anyway, you're certainly very bold!
But... before we leave, if you'd like, I could give you some makeup tips. I'm a little too familiar with body stuff, so...
Holy crap. You're a total babe.
Haru! It's going to be okay! I'm right here with you!
(I'm always so jealous of girls that can just be so sexual! I have needs and wants too! But... as an idol, it's terribly improper.)
I just... had, like, a stray like, thought, is like, all.
Tell you what, why don't I sign an album or a poster for you, later?
I think it's really impressive how you can keep up your act... (Sakura! Stop ruining it for her! Just enjoy it!)
It's really weird, but... butt!
You... didn't wear shorts or anything, did you? I know some girls do that, but I always found them to be a little sporty...
Of course, of course! Take your time!
W-wait! Too big! Too big too--
You're really lucky to have someone that gets to--wants to--undress you, Crown Prince...
"Her?"
O-Oh! You were a woman! I didn't want to assume---
Me neither, Nagisa! But... hopefully we're more like friends than strangers after this?
No problem. Sometimes, the best things are done in the privacy of your home, right?
Smart! You'd... not be surprised how many people try to sneak a peek at our panties at Franchouchou concerts.
(Hm. She'd look less cute in a sheer bra and thong though...)
...Are you stupid, Remilia?
(A girl like her shouldn't get to dress in such cute underwear. It's not suitable.)
(She's kind of foul, but that's part of the fun, right? Ai and Yugiri are going to flip!)
Oh gosh, what is she doing?
But, I guess, whether you're an idol or not, we're all just girls under our outfits, huh?
I'm wondering that too! It's a neat trick I'd definitely love to see Franchouchou use... Yugiri would... um...
(Wow, she's really nervous!) Aww, come on, Saki... just between us, I bet a cute girl like you's taken off her shirt for her boyfriend, right?
W-wow, that's a uniform, really? You made it look so cute.
Though, most of the stuff I wear on stage isn't that cute. Underwear-wise. Underwise?
If it helps, you're definitely wearing panties. You don't wear skirts that often, huh...?
...I was so distracted by your breasts I didn't even notice...
O-oh, I wouldn't dream of taking those, Sayla! I don't even really like tights. I'm more of a shorts or skirts girl...
A beach, then strip poker, you sure lead an interesting life, Sayla. Are you sure you're not an idol?
S-sayori, couldn't you have counted your ribbon?
I-I wasn't staring! I was-- keeping a keen eye! Just to make sure you didn't need more encouragement!
W-wow! So that's the style these days, huh?
I could never pull off something that cute, ~name~...
I may be a zombie... but... could you not? Seriously?
You know you have a good show when you've made an idol fixate on your costume... and not your underwear.
You're so cute! Even as flashy as you can be, you really just like the plain underwear, huh? Maybe that gives you more to build on?
O-oh. Your sisters are kind of mean, Catria.
I'm jealous... you look so good in stuff you fight in! I wish I looked that good in things I was supposed to look great in.
Cute set, Florina! I'd expected a knight like you to be more practical than something so... cute!
If you're cold, I could always give you a hug... (The best way to make new fans is to comfort them, and she reminds me a lot of Junko...)
That's a relief! I was expecting a horrible spider monster or something. Not that I have... other reasons to believe something like that exists!
Well... think about it. You look fine, but, who doesn't like to get dolled up and feel super max hype about themselves?
If it helps, Hanako, Number Three's body is covered in burns, and she's probably the best looking of anyone in Franchouchou.
Y-y'know, Haru... as an idol, I can't pretend that I'm enjoying this personality... if you know what I mean?
You look beautiful! Franchouchou #1 is here to back you up! Promise! No matter what, we're here together!
(Oh no, it's, like, contagious!)
(Nobody could actually... be this... right?)
Y-you... wow! You even have a bra! (And of course it's adorable...)
...Franchouchou has had some struggles with CGI animation... for music videos and things like that... (Gosh. They really put a lot of work into her details, didn't they?)
If it makes you feel better, most idols just have lots of lacy fluff under their skirts to stop unwanted photography. Maybe you'd try something like that?
I think you might want to stick to photos, Mahiru! You aren't much of an actress...
L-Ladybug, w-what was that!?
--too... thick. Wow. Whatever diet you're on, I'm now very interested.
Well, I may be down... well, I may be out! Um! I'm not defeated in spirit, Your Grace!
This is some weird magic thing, right? I may be... um... nevermind. Let's just go to the next hand, why don't we?
As long as you're comfortable, why does it really matter?
Yeah... what an awful scar, Misato...
Wait... is that one of those Big Dango Family bras!? I know my good friend Ai loved that jingle!
N-not to imply anything untoward, Nagisa!
As some advice, if you don't mind looking too cute, sew some lacy fabric under the skirt in ruffles. It covers the goods and looks super floofy!
(So defensive!)
You can't just treat everyone like they're beneath you! You should serve as an example. Especially if you're really a noble. What about the people who look up to you?
So, Sakuya, about that drink. I could use another one...
No problems here, ma'am! (I'm gonna do it! Next time she loses, I'll ask her for that autograph!)
R-Rinkah, you're... we can see your... it's... very wild!
That's amazing! You should've told me you were an idol sooner!
You know, I think it's okay if you hold onto your uniform a little longer. It's hard to let go of a cool outfit.
Can't you two just get along? You're making my job really, really hard... (I'm used to fans debating over which member they like most... this is extreme!
Um... er... nevermind, then, so sorry to bother you. Sorry, sorry, sorry.
You have great taste in underwear. It's cute, but sensible, and functional.
S-so many bra malfunctions tonight...
Tip from an idol: sew cotton ruffle under your skirts. Um... the non-magical ones. It stops people from seeing your panties. Trust me.
Don't give up, Sayaka! Don't be overcome by despair! You can do this!
Tell me about it. How complicated do outfits really need to be?
Oh, really? That's a good reason for me not to wear them then, huh?
War? Like... an idol war... or a war war? Where are you from, again?
Wow, you must play here a lot if they have rules for you...
That's my Sayori! Don't give up! Keep fighting for the things you want!
You look so cute, Sayori! It's almost a shame we have to get dressed after this... w-well, not a shame at all, really, but...
Is that true? It looks just like some of the stuff we wear under our idol outfits...
To really save Saga, I need all the inspiration I can get!
This is kind of steamy... me, doing this, while you undress... I'd... be so terribly embarrassed if you got the wrong idea... (Please, please get the wrong idea.)
Pit, I'd like to think all of our outfits are pretty intricate! But... I guess the boys dressed the part tonight.
I'm... definitely feeling the inspiration from you, ~name~. Can't you tell?
If an idol's supposed to make people feel the love, I think, really, I should get to feel ~name~'s chest...
(Pit has wings. 9S is a robot. I'm a zombie. W-what's ~player~'s trope?)
Are you really an angel? That makes me feel a lot less weird about the zombie thing. Buuut I'd rather have been an angel than a zombie.
Whip it out! Let's see it!
I-I may have died a virgin, but... before that, I'm... not a stranger to...
I... yeah, Pit, thanks for being the first person to think of that...
You're really good with your mouth, huh, Kamina?
I'm sure you're very impressive! I know at least one girl who's really excited to see you...
(Should I really be so picky? I am undead, but that's not really doing it for me...)
I-I know you can't control your body any more than I can control mine, b-but...
O-oh! (I-I'd let him just do whatever he wanted...!)
Now that is a mic I'd like to put right to my lips...
Looks like you're going to have to really practice your endurance tonight, Pit!
Take as much time to warm up as you need. I imagine you get pretty hot, after all... if only there was a way to get you off... c-cooled off!
N-Nines...? Can you control how long you last...? I'm a little curious...
Well, that girl is me, and I'm happy for it!
I bet I could feel every inch of that inside me... and then some...
That's a really big and impressive… thing... y-you know, it'd be a shame not to use that to do some damage to this zombie.
I mean, you're good at running your mouth! So let's see you put your... feelings where your actions are!
I-I may have given in to some urges, but there's no way you should give up, ~name~!
Until the last hand, let your spark burn bright, ~name~!
Getting really strappy, aren't you, Akko?
Whoever they are, I'm sure they'll appreciate you regardless of the size of your breasts.
If it makes you feel better, Florina, I get to see the other girls on my team naked all the time. It's okay to be conscious, but I promise I've seen lots weirder.
It's okay, Florina! I'm sure you're gorgeous, and I'm sure everyone's going to be nothing but respectful!
